title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling People Recognition in a Teams Meeting with a desktop client face enrollment process
description: This item has been cancelled due to duplication. Users will be able to enroll their face and create a face profile using the new enrollment process in the Teams desktop client. The face profile is used in Teams Rooms meetings where an Intelligent Camera capable of People Recognition is deployed to recognize in-room attendees, and then labels their identity for all meeting participants, both in-room and remote.
